wikipedia_page.main: Keith Hicks (born 9 August 1954 in Oldham, Lancashire) is an English former footballer who played as a central defender. He made 475 appearances in the Football League during the 1970s and 1980s for Oldham Athletic, Hereford United and Rochdale, before moving into non-league football with Hyde United, Mossley, including a spell as player-manager, and Radcliffe Borough.He is now a Football in the Community officer at Rochdale.
